movie.title: Only the Brave
movie.plot: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

events.title: the Yarnell Hill Fire kills 19 members of the Granite Mountain Hotshots
